content: section and work the continuation of the wings on pages 28/29 rh/lh = right hand/ left hand rs/ws = right side/ wrong side - you can of course have both st/ sts =stitch/ stitches skpo = slip one stitch knit next stitch pass slipped stitch over knit stitch to decrease by one stitch kfb = knit into front then into back of stitch to increase by one stitch pfb = purl into front then knit into back of stitch to increase by one stitch p-wise = purl-wise ws = wrong side purl-side in the case of this pattern bat page 4 bat page 5 beginning with the head with yarn a forehead cast on 8 sts for mouth seam note although you ll be turning mid-row these following row are not wrap row 1 increase kfb k2 kfb twice k2 kfb 12sts and turn short row as before row 2 purl row 7 increase k10 kfb twice k1 turn row 3 increase kfb k4 kfb twice k4 kfb 16sts row 8 p6 turn row 4 purl row 9 increase k2 kfb twice k2 turn row 10 p8 turn left muzzle row 11 increase k2 kfb k2 kfb k2 turn work short row for left muzzle row 12 p10 turn short row 1 k5 w+tk row 13 increase kfb four times k2 kfb four times 18sts short row 2 p5 row 14 p18 turn short row 3 increase kfb k3 w+tk row 15 increase kfb k16 kfb then knit across all 9 sts from right cheek on left short row 4 p5 knitting needle 29sts short row 5 k4 w+tk row 16 purl across all 29 sts then purl across the 9 sts from left cheek - 38sts short row 6 p4 row 17 decrease k8 k2tog k18 k2tog k8 - 36sts row 5 increase kfb k7 kfb twice k7 to end of row 20sts row 18 20 & 22 purl right muzzle row 19 decrease k15 skpo k2 k2tog k15 to end of row - 34sts work short row for right muzzle pm on first and last stitch of last knit row for left and right neck markers short row 1 p5 w+tp row 21 decrease k14 skpo k2 k2tog k14 to end of row - 32sts short row 2 k5 row 23 decrease k14 skpo k2tog k14 to end of row 30sts short row 3 increase pfb p3 w+tp row 24 purl short row 4 k5 divide the head back to create head back seam as follows short row 5 p4 w+tp row 25 decrease cast off 9 sts for head back seam left-side knit next 11 sts cast off short row 6 k4 last 9 sts for head back seam right-side 12sts row 6 increase pfb purl to end of row 22sts head back pm on first and last stitch of last row for left and right muzzle markers ws facing rejoin yarn to 12 sts for head back continue as follows row 26-38 beginning with a purl
